name: dividends
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twelve_data.
Tool description: Financial data provided for developers, to enter the world markets. Instant access for real-time and historical data of stocks, forex, crypto, ETFs, indices, and more. Read more in [documentation](https://twelvedata.com/docs) and start [here](https://twelvedata.com/apikey).
API description: Returns the amount of dividends paid out for the last 10+ years.

Availability: Pro plan
Data weighting: 20 API credits per symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol for which to retrieve dividend information.

start_date.description: The start date for the dividend data in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

end_date.description: The end date for the dividend data in YYYY-MM-DD format. Defaults to None.

country.description: The country of the stock exchange. Defaults to None.

range.description: The range for the dividend data. Example: '6m' for six months. Defaults to '6m'.

exchange.description: The stock exchange where the symbol is listed. Defaults to None.
